item.title: Old Dominion University earns NSA cybersecurity validation
item.description: Old Dominion University becomes first university to earn NSA Cybersecurity Validation 🏆

item.title: Context-driven Deep Learning Forecasting for Wastewater Treatment Plants
Joining as a Presidential Postdoctoral Fellow at Virginia Tech
item.description: Joining as a Presidential Postdoctoral Fellow at Virginia Tech, affiliated with CCI and BSE/ECE. ✨

item.title: Adversarial Image Detection in Agriculture
item.description:
• Classifies high-fidelity adversarial plant images; attributes source models (StyleGAN2/3, DS8, BLIP, Pix2Pix) alongside health status.
  • Trains EfficientNet-B0 / ResNet-50 / CLIP-ViT on binary health, source (Real/GAN/Diffusion), and detailed 10-way crop–health–generator tasks.
  • Designed to scale as new generators emerge; targets cyber-biosecurity for Agriculture 4.0 systems.
  • Authors: Md Nazmul Kabir Sikder, Mehmet Oguz Yardimci, Trey Ward, Shubham Laxmikant Deshmukh, Feras A. Batarseh (Preprint, 2025).

item.title: AI Methods for Anomaly Detection in Cyber-Physical Systems: With Application to Water and Agriculture
Successfully defended Ph.D. dissertation at Virginia Tech
item.description: Successfully defended Ph.D. dissertation from Virginia Tech ✨ 🎓 🎉 📚 🔬 🏆

item.title: Attended AAAI Fall 2024 Symposium
11 recent cyber attacks on the water and wastewater sector
item.description: 11 recent cyber attacks on the water and wastewater sector 💻 🔒 🔥 🛡️ 💥 💀 ❗ ⚔️ 😱 ☣️

item.title: cP2O: Context-Aware Water Level Forecasting
item.description:
• Two-stage pipeline: temporal context extraction plus multi-horizon forecasting.
  • Achieves >95% accuracy with real-time updates for overflow prevention.
  • Designed for smart water/WWTP operations.

item.title: New partnership uses AI to bolster efficiency and cybersecurity for water treatment
item.description: New partnership uses AI to bolster efficiency, cybersecurity for water treatment ✨ 👨‍🏫 💧

item.title: P2O: AI-Driven Framework for Managing and Securing Wastewater Treatment Plants
Model-Agnostic Assurance (ALSP)
item.description:
• Shapley-value weight assessment, reverse learning, and secret inversion to quantify XAI/FAI/SAI.
  • Generates per-sample assurance scores and adversarial logging for production monitoring.
  • Published with ALSP framework and validation on real-world models.

item.title: DeepAg: Precision Farming Anomaly Detection
item.description:
• Unsupervised outlier detection tailored to crop production signals.
  • Integrates financial indices (oil, gold, DJIA, S&P500, VIX) for risk-aware decisions.
  • Targets real-time alerts to reduce losses and optimize farm operations.

item.title: Assessing the Impact of Cyber Attacks on Water Distribution Systems: A Deep Learning Approach
Deep H2O: Cyber attacks detection in water distribution systems using deep learning
Outlier detection using AI: a survey
2022 Intelligent Water Systems Challenge winning solution

item.title: Model-Agnostic Scoring Methods for Artificial Intelligence Assurance
A3 Lab and Commonwealth Cyber Initiative (CCI) partner with DC Water for Tunnel Water Level Forecasting
item.description: A3 Lab and Commonwealth Cyber Initiative (CCI) partner with DC Water for Tunnel Water Level Forecasting ✨

item.title: IWS Challenge 2022: Integrated AI for Water Systems
item.description:
• Prediction: LSTM-based tunnel water level forecasting with robust preprocessing.
  • Protection: Cyber-physical attack detection and classification on SMOD-style datasets.
  • Optimization: Genetic algorithm pump scheduling to cut energy use and prevent overflows.
